application.name: viknobutter
application.brief: Final step of Viking Orbiter Level 1 image clean-up
application.description: This program will perform the final level 1 clean up processing sequence on a Viking Orbiter PDS image to remove butterflies from the image.

parameter.name: FROM
parameter.description: The cube to be cleaned. The cube will be ran through a series of filters to remove butterflies from the image.

parameter.name: TO
parameter.description: The resultant cube containing the cleaned data.

parameter.name: REMOVE
parameter.description: Option to remove or leave intermediate cube files made by the application

example.brief: Input Viking Image to have butterflies removed
example.description: This example shows the viknobutter application in action. It removes all butterflies from the image.

terminalInterface.description: Input a viking image to remove butterflies from and give it an output file name.

image.brief: Viking Image to Remove Butterflies from
image.description: This is the input viking image prior to the removal of butterflies.
This is the viking image after the viknobutter application has been run.
